description: This view returns all defining information about a patient's SDOH data that is configured in the system. Each row in this table represents documentation for a single SDOH domain for a single patient.that can be used for EHI requests.

columns.name: SDOH_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the social determinant data record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status. SDD only supports soft deleted records.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: DOMAIN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the domain this record stores data for.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Intimate Partner Violence


Social Connections


Alcohol Use


Tobacco Use


Financial Resource Strain


Depression


Stress


Physical Activity


Food Insecurity


Transportation Needs


Housing Stability


Health Literacy


Substance Use


Internet Access


Digital Skills


Inadequate Housing


Homelessness


Educational Attainment


Employment Status


Veteran Status


Elder Abuse


Health Insurance Status


Medical Cost Burden


Utilities


Personal Safety


Access to Care


Postpartum Depression


Caregiver Education and Work


Safety and Environment


Caregiver Health


Child Education


Adolescent Education and Socialization


Adolescent Substance Use


Adolescent Education


Adolescent Socialization

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient this SDD record stores data for.

columns.name: CONCERNS_PRESENT_YN
columns.description:
Tracks whether the patient has needs in any source for this domain. Checks the most recent entry across all sources to determine if there is a concern.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
